official_title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present, on behalf of the Congress, a gold medal to Lenny Skutnik.

summary.text: Requests the President to present, on behalf of Congress, a gold medal to Lenny Skutnik, in recognition of his heroic rescue of one of the victims of the airline crash into the Potomac River on January 13, 1982. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present, on behalf of the Congress, a gold medal to Lenny Skutnik.
